description.value:
Requirements You are in your favored location; you are currently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden], unobserved, or unnoticed by all enemies; and you are not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued].

You move and attack with deadly silence, unbelievable speed, and unlimited ferocity. Strike with a blowgun or sling; if the Strike is successful, the enemy cannot tell where it came from and you remain hidden. Immediately after the successful Strike, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] to a new location, Interact to reload a blowgun or sling, and Strike again, remaining hidden on a successful Strike. If the second Strike is successful, you can Sneak, Interact to reload, and then Strike with a sling or blowgun a third time, remaining hidden after a successful Strike.

After using Lonely Army, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued] for 1 minute.
